snippet: The mother of Ali Dawabsheh killed in a firebombing in July died of her wounds early Monday, a relative said.
abstract: Palestinian woman Riham Dawabsheh becomes third family member to die from injuries sustained in firebombing in West Bank town of Duma; Jewish extremist vigilantes are suspected in attack.
lead_paragraph: The mother of Ali Dawabsheh killed in a firebombing in July died of her wounds early Monday, a relative said.

headline.main: Mother of Palestinian Toddler Killed in Fire Attack Dies
headline.print_headline: Mother of Toddler Killed in Attack Dies
